In order to enable the automatic version: In order to enable the automatic version checking you have to register your portal on chamilo.org. The information obtained by clicking this button is only for internal use and only aggregated data will be publicly available (total number of portals, total number of Chamilo course, total number of Chamilo users, ...) (see {0}). When registering you will also appear on the worldwide list ({1}). If you do not want to appear in this list you have to check the checkbox below. The registration is as easy as it can be: you only have to click this button:
To protect your site, make the whole {0}: Si aad u ilaaliso goobtaada, ka dhig {0} diiwaanka oo dhan mid akhri-kaliya (chmod -R 0555 Linux-ka) oo tirtir {1} diiwaanka.
Cannot find your language in the list? C: Ma aadan ka heli luqadaada liiska? La xidhiidh info@chamilo.org si aad uga qaybqaato tarjumaane ahaan.
Please read the following requirements t: Fadlan akhri shuruudaha soo socda si dhammaystir.
Recommended settings for your server con: Dejimaha lagu talinayo ee qaabaynta server-kaaga. Dejimahan waxaa lagu dejiyaa faylka qaabaynta php.ini ee server-kaaga.
Chamilo is free software distributed und: Chamilo waa software lacag la'aan ah oo lagu qaybiyay liisanka Guud ee GNU (GPL).
The install script will create (or use): Script-ka rakibidu wuxuu abuuri doonaa (ama isticmaali doonaa) database-ka Chamilo isagoo isticmaalaya magaca database-ka halkan la siiyay. Fadlan hubi in isticmaalka aad siiso uu leeyahay xuquuqda uu ku abuuro database-ka magaca halkan la siiyay. Haddii database magacani jiro, waa la beddeli doonaa. Fadlan ha isticmaalin isticmaalka root-ka sida isticmaale database-ka Chamilo. Tani waxay keeni kartaa arrimo ammaan oo halis ah.
The install script will erase all tables: Qoraalka rakibida wuxuu tirtiri doonaa dhammaan miisaska xogta la doortay. Waxaan si weyn kuu talinaynaa in aad samayso keyd buuxa ka hor inta aan xaqiijin tallaabadan ugu dambeysa ee rakibida.
Are you sure you want to delete {0}?: Ma hubtaa in aad rabto in aad tirtirto {0}?
Fadlan sug, tani waxay qaadan kartaa wakhti...
Faylalka kaliya ayaa la beddeli karaa.
Download selected items as ZIP: Soosaar waxyaabaha la doortay sida ZIP
Qalad soo dejinta waxyaabaha la doortay.
This icon will show for the link display: Astaantan waxay muuqan doontaa xiriirka ee loo soo bandhigo sida qalab bogga hore ee koorsada.
2FA si guul leh ayaa loo joojiyay.
The database connection has failed. This: Xiriirka database-ku wuu fashilmay. Tani guud ahaan waxay sabab u tahay isticmaale khaldan, lambar sir ah oo khaldan ama horgale database-ka khaldan oo kor lagu dejiyay. Fadlan dib u eeg goobahan oo isku day mar kale.
Tag portal-kaaga cusub ee la abuuray.
The DSN fully includes all parameters ne: DSN-ku waxa uu si buuxda uga kooban yahay dhammaan xuduudaha loo baahan yahay in lagu xidho adeegga boostinka. Waxaad wax badan ka baran kartaa {0}. Qiimaha caadiga ah waa null://null waxayna joojinaysaa dirida iimaylka. Isticmaal native://default si aad u isticmaasho dejinta PHP ee caadiga ah ee serverkaaga. Halkan waxaa jira dhawr tusaalood oo ah qaababka DSN ee la taageero: {1}.
The e-mail address from which e-mails wi: Cinwaanka iimaylka laga soo dirayo marka platformku uu soo dirayo iimaylka, sidoo kale loo isticmaalo sidii 'reply-to' madax. Waxaan ku talinaynaa in aad halkan isticmaasho cinwaan iimayl 'no-reply', si looga fogaado buuxinta xad dhaafka ah ee sanduuqa iimaylka. Cinwaanka iimaylka taageerada ee lagu qeexay qaybta Platform waa in loo isticmaalaa in lagu kula soo xiriiro, laakiin ka jawaabista ogeysiisyada tooska ah waa in aan la dhiirigelin.
The name that appears as the sender (nex: Magaca ka muuqda sidaha (geesta cinwaanka iimaylka 'From') marka platformku uu soo dirayo iimayl.
Xogta rakibuhu waa ka maqan tahay.
Test email sent successfully: Iimaylka tijaabinta si guul leh ayaa loo diray
Error during test email:: Qaladka inta lagu guda jiro iimaylka tijaabinta:
Some directories and the files they incl: Hagarrada qaarkood iyo faylalka ay ku jiraan waa in ay qori karaan server-ka web-ka si Chamilo u shaqeeyo (faylalada isticmaale ee la soo galiyay, faylalka html ee bogga guriga, ...). Tani waxay yeelan kartaa beddel gacmeed server-kaaga (ka baxsan interface-kaas).
A database with the same name already ex: Database leh magac isku mid ayaa hore u jiray. Waa la tirtiri doonaa.
When you enter your portal for the first: Marka aad markii ugu horreysay soo gasho portal-kaaga, haba ugu wanaagsan ee aad ku fahanto waa in aad abuurto koorsad xiriirka 'Abuur koorsad' ee menu-ga oo aad ku ciyaarto wax yar.
You are about to start using one of the: Waxaad bilaabaysaa in aad isticmaasho mid ka mid ah aaladaha e-learning-ka ee ugu fiican ee suuqa. Sida mashaariicda kale ee Open Source-ka, Chamilo waxaa taageeraya bulsho ballaadhan oo arday, macallimiin, horumariye, abwaaniin waxaana ku jira ganacsi raba in ay si fiican u kor u qaadaan mashruuca.
By knowing a little bit more about you,: Markaad wax yar ka ogaato, maamule platform ah, mid ka mid ah nooca ugu muhiimsan ee noo muhiimsan, oo maamuli doona nidaamkan e-learning-ka, waxaan awoodi doonnaa in aan dadka u sheegno, tirakoob ahaan, sida software-keenna loo isticmaalo iyada oo la ixtiraamayo asturnaantaada. Waxaan sidoo kale awoodi doonnaa in aan kuu sheegno marka aan qabanqaabno dhacdooyin kaa khuseeya ama aan bixiyo adeegyo dheeraad ah oo qiimo u yeelan kara ururkaaga.
By filling this form, you agree that the: Markaad foomkan buuxiso, waxaad ogolaanaysaa in tifaftiraha Chamilo, shirkadda {0}, oo ka diiwaan gashan Belgium, iyo/ama xubno ka mid ah shabakadeeda la-shaqeynteeda (kuwa kaliya bixiyeyaasha adeegyada Chamilo) ay marmar kuu soo diri karaan macluumaad iimaylka ku saabsan dhacdooyinka muhiimsan ama cusboonaysiinta software-ka Chamilo ama bulshada. Tani waxay ka caawin doontaa bulshada in ay u korodho sidii hay'ad la abaabulay oo macluumaadka ku socda, iyada oo ixtiraam buuxa leh waqtigaaga iyo asturnaantaada.
Please note that you are NOT REQUIRED to: Fadlan ogow in aan LAAQAN LAGA BAHNAN IN aad foomkan buuxiso. Haddii aad rabto in aad qarsoodi ahaato, waxaan lumin doonnaa fursadda in aan ku siino dhammaan mudnaanta ahayd ee ah maamule portal diiwaan gashan, laakiin waan ixtiraami doonnaa go'aankaaga. Si fudud foomkan ka tag oo riix Next.

Where do we record the data? (in which s: Xaggee ku diiwaan gelinaynaa xogta? (nidaamkaas, meesha la degay, shirkadda maamusha server-yada, iwm.)
How is the data structured? To what exte: Sidee xogta u habaysan tahay? Ilaalin intee le'eg ayay ururinta xogta u ilaalisaa amnigaaga? ... Ma haysataa habab la aasaasay oo hubiya in haan-guuraanku aanu aruurin karin dhammaan xogta shakhsi ahaaneed ee isku dayga koowaad? Miyay la qarsoodi yihiin?
How is the data structured in this softw: Sidee xogta u habaysan tahay software-ka? (tab furan oo dhan xogta, waxay leedahay qaybsanaan / calaamad, ...)
How long do we save the data? Is there d: Mudo intee le'eg ayaan xogta ilaalinaynaa? Ma jiraa xog dhacda xitaa haddii xisaabtu weli shaqaynayso? Intee le'eg ayaan xogta u ilaalinaynaa ka dib isticmaalka ugu dambeeyay ee nidaamka?
What changes can we make to the data? Wh: Waxa xogta iska bedeli karnaa? Waxa isbeddelada xogta la samayn karo iyadoo aan la saameyn adeegga?
What do we extract data for (towards oth: Waxa xogta loo soo saaro (dhanka hababka gudaha) iyo xagta xogta tahay?
Who can consult the personal data? For w: Yaa la tashan karaa xogta shakhsi ahaaneed? Ujeedada waa maxay?
How and for what can we use the personal: Sidee iyo maxaan u isticmaali karnaa xogta shakhsi ahaaneed?
With whom can we share them? In what opp: Laamina yaqaannoo la wadaagi karnaa? Xilliyada intee le'eg? Iyadoo loo marayo hababkee (ammaan ah iyo kale)?
Do we have another system with which Cha: Ma haysanno nidaam kale oo Chamilo la shaqeeya? Waa maxay habka isku xirka? Waa maxay xogta la beddelo iyo sidee loo beddelo?
What are the limits that we will always: Waa maxay xuduudaha aan mar walba ilaalin doonno marka la isticmaalayo xogta shakhsi ahaaneed? Ilaa intee ayaan gaadhi karnaa?
After how long do we erase the data? (ev: Mudo intee le'eg kadib ayaan xogta tirtirnaa? (dhacdo, isticmaalka ugu dambeeyay, ansaxnimada qandaraaska, iwm.) Waa maxay hababka tirtirka?
What happens if the data is destroyed as: Maxaa dhacaya haddii xogta la burburiyo natiijada cilad farsamo? (tirtirid aan la oggolayn ama luminta agabka, tusaale ahaan)
For what purpose do we process personal: Waxaan u shaqaynnaa xogta shakhsi ahaaneed? Ma u isticmaalnaa si aan u shaaciyo gelitaanka isticmaale ee qaybo gaar ah oo ka mid ah codsigeena? (takoorid taban ama togan)
